name: Artificial (itch) (SaeLin Studios)
description:
You don't remember anything. Not your name, not the name of the man in front of you. Can you trust him? Why does he seem so sad? And what is he doing with that screwdriver anyways?


  • Protagonist with customizable name and pronouns
  • A male scientist with a mysterious, melancholic past
  • 4 endings with varying degrees of happiness
  • A short epilogue following the true ending
  • ~5k words, ~30 min playtime
  • 2 CGs, 2 unlockable content arts
  • 1 sprite, 99 sprite variations
  • Implied violence
  • Past trauma
  • Slight mentions of death
  • Gaslighting

Reader discretion is advised.
